column4: i just wished that my wifi card worked in native mode without having to use ndiswrapper.. it worked in Fedora Core 3 when I tested it out but when i compile the driver modules and try to insert them i get a module format error, yet the module is 2.6.X..lol
ive booted xp from fat32 before, now mind you I did upgrade to ntfs a few months later
then perhaps it is possible but not supported. I am surprised though.
